member.name: T:Karzina.Common.ConfigurationHelper
member.summary: Provides access to applicationSettings, userSettings, appSettings and custom configuration sections contained within an external configuration file.

member.summary: The key of the appSetting value in the application.exe.config that points to the external configuration file.

member.summary: Provides access to applicationSettings, userSettings and appSettings stored in an external configuration file.

member.param: The path to the section to be returned.

member.name: P:Karzina.Common.ConfigurationHelper.ConfigurationFileName
member.summary: The name of the configuration file pointed to from the standard {application name}

member.name: P:Karzina.Common.ConfigurationHelper.userSettings
